column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place is great with a group. Very reasonable prices
column3: and the awesome server staff never hurries you out of your seat. The classic sangria is worth a full pitcher. Also recommend the bacon wrapped dates
column5: and patatas bravas. If you check in on Yelp
column6: you can also usually get a free dessert or side-- per person who checks in!
